content.rendered:
Photo via Gratisography

This Week in Genesis, we may have slightly overindulged on new theme releases, BobWP rounds-up the recent StudioPress theme improvements for WooCommerce, and a whole lot of goings on in the world of Genesis hook guides!

Themes

Jesse Petersen launches a new theme, Hueman. It’s a great looking blog theme and if you’ve been following along with Jesse recently, you might’ve also seen it out in the wild over at newlungsfor.me.

Soft-launch night. I present GenesisTheme Hueman, mobile-first blogging theme (dev license available). https://t.co/jTetHWeh3z #genesiswp

— Jesse Ⓦ Petersen (@jpetersen) April 6, 2017

He’s also offering 10% off everything over at GenesisThe.me this weekend, with code 10PERCENTSOCIAL.

GenesisTheme Hueman launch weekend 10% discount off the entire store. Grab a deal now. 10PERCENTSOCIAL #genesiswp https://t.co/rqiiGNJFSV

— Jesse Ⓦ Petersen (@jpetersen) April 8, 2017

Seo Themes continue their prodigious release rate with not one but two theme releases in a single week.

First up, a minimalist, black and white portfolio theme, Limitless Pro.

Introducing Limitless Pro – A clean & modern #WordPress theme for the Genesis Framework. Check it out! https://t.co/GSwChXvSFh #genesiswp

— Seo Themes (@seothemeswp) April 3, 2017

Next, a stylish looking new agency style theme, Studio Pro. Plus there’s 20% off with coupon code STUDIOPRO20.

Introducing our latest theme – Studio Pro. A #genesiswp theme for creative agencies with background video support https://t.co/Tbs5ysDArP

— Seo Themes (@seothemeswp) April 8, 2017

Get 20% of with the coupon code STUDIOPRO20 – Check out the live demo here https://t.co/Fa0Nx55zaL

— Seo Themes (@seothemeswp) April 8, 2017

And speaking of prodigious, ZigZagPress release their 35th theme, Minimalis.

Introducing Minimalis: our 35th #genesiswp child theme!https://t.co/0D7R4TDvTP

— zigzagpress.com (@zigzagpress) April 4, 2017

They’re also offering 40% off everything for a limited time with code getzzp17.

Just a few more hours to get 40% off 35 beautiful, feature-rich #genesiswp child themes & theme packages!https://t.co/NWfQ4bUnDL

— zigzagpress.com (@zigzagpress) April 7, 2017

Calvin Koepke shares his Genesis Starter theme on GitHub.

Finally got my Starter Theme on GitHub for all you fabulous #genesiswp hackers to download: https://t.co/AVcFSlnU4w

— Calvin (@cjkoepke) April 7, 2017

Plus, he’s continuing work on a new theme, Canvas Pro.

Speaking of #genesiswp fun, current status: https://t.co/1rl5jAhTl0

— Calvin (@cjkoepke) April 7, 2017

Showcase

Stephanie Hellwig for thesongteller.com

Recently launched this #genesiswp #WordPress site for the talented #western #singersongwriter https://t.co/W93KED1R4R pic.twitter.com/Ib2qsR6aZE

— Stephanie Hellwig (@stephanehellwig) April 7, 2017

Claire with a new website for kidsatbakerstreet.co.uk

New website for Kids@Baker Street just launched. Built with #genesiswp! Can be viewed at: https://t.co/dKDKAL3EJK pic.twitter.com/JDnlNwu5fC

— Claire / W&P (@wildflowerspix) April 7, 2017

Tara Claeys with a new Genesis and Beaver Builder powered site for erdleconsulting.com

Fun site launch! https://t.co/0uTwrgvQ6Y #color #graphics @WordPress @BeaverBuilder @GenesisWPguide #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/e4jISK1tdY

— Tara Claeys (@design_tlc) April 7, 2017

Andrea Whitmer has updated her popular website, nutsandboltsmedia.com

Rebuilt my site this weekend – new custom #genesiswp theme, brand new WP install… I think it’s a love connection. https://t.co/SooxaWjMCM

— Andrea Whitmer (@nutsandbolts) April 4, 2017

Best of the rest

Sridhar Katakam launched a new Genesis Simple Hook Guide available as a plugin or reference website.

Genesis Simple Hook Guide:https://t.co/4rHikl1MpM#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/X4VWNeNbd7

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) April 8, 2017

Of course, many in the Genesis community will be familar with Chris Cochran’s original Genesis Visual Hook Guide plugin / website. And there was some discussion on Twitter about whether this could’ve been a pull request to Chris’ version.

@srikat I'm sure @tweetsfromchris would welcome this as PR to his plugin

— Remkus de Vries (@DeFries) April 8, 2017

However Chris has now released a v1.0 update to Genesis Visual Hook Guide, so whichever flavour of hooks you prefer it looks like you’ll be well covered for the foreseeable future.

Version 1.0.0 released for the Genesis Visual Hook Guide plugin. #GenesisWP https://t.co/1YATqguRTM

— Christopher Cochran (@tweetsfromchris) April 9, 2017

BobWP shared a detailed round-up of the recent StudioPress theme improvements for better WooCommerce compatibility.

StudioPress Genesis Child Themes Updates Improve Compatibility with WooCommerce https://t.co/MY5ow8UXsB #genesiswp @studiopress @WooCommerce pic.twitter.com/rbHtMtr5FK

— BobWP (@bobWP) March 31, 2017

Brian Gardner rocked another Facebook Live.

Join @bgardner live on Facebook. Ask him anything you want! —> https://t.co/orgsCqbfck #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/6WA38uST2x

— StudioPress (@studiopress) April 6, 2017

StudioPress Sites came first in a speed test of WordPress hosts.

StudioPress Sites came out number one in this speed test of WordPress hosts: https://t.co/m20Xt0sZKh pic.twitter.com/XMS8k99BtG

— Brian Clark (@brianclark) April 6, 2017

And finally…

We’ve never had any music on This Week in Genesis before, but you might enjoy this Genesis flavoured finger picking from Remkus de Vries’ son Roan.

Finger picking good
Freestyle 🎸 playing by @roan_v https://t.co/N29d9juozU

— Remkus de Vries (@DeFries) April 8, 2017

excerpt.rendered: We may have slightly overindulged on new theme releases, BobWP rounds-up the recent StudioPress theme improvements for WooCommerce, and a whole lot of goings on in the world of Genesis hook guides!
